name: karakeep
description: Karakeep is a home automation dashboard and control interface. It aggregates device statuses, scenes and automations into a single web UI, aiming to simplify management of self hosted smart home stacks.
features: Unified Dashboard: Control all smart home devices from a single interface. Simplify home automation management.
Device Control: Toggle lights, adjust thermostats, and control switches directly. Manage devices with one click.
Scene Management: Create and trigger scenes that control multiple devices simultaneously. Automate common scenarios.
Automation Interface: Build and manage automation rules with visual workflow editor. Create smart home logic easily.
Real-Time Status: Live updates of device states and sensor readings. Monitor your home instantly.
Room Organization: Group devices by room or area for logical organization. Navigate your home structure intuitively.
Mobile Responsive: Access and control your home from smartphones and tablets. Manage from anywhere.
Custom Widgets: Add specialized widgets for specific device types or functions. Tailor interface to your needs.
Integration Support: Connect with popular smart home platforms and protocols. Work with existing devices.
Energy Monitoring: Track power consumption and energy usage across devices. Optimize home efficiency.
Notification System: Receive alerts for device events, automation triggers, and system issues. Stay informed about home status.
User Permissions: Control access levels for different household members. Secure your smart home system.
